body:
This morning, Donald J. Trump read aloud the phone number of Senator Lindsey Graham during a speech in South Carolina and encouraged people to call the senator.

Mr. Graham took to Twitter to respond: 

— Lindsey Graham (@LindseyGrahamSC) July 21, 2015
description: Senator Lindsey Graham took to Twitter after Donald J. Trump gave out the senator’s cellphone number and asked people to call it.
title: First Draft: Verbatim: A New Phone for Lindsey Graham, Thanks to Donald Trump
